title: Admission Notification: 4-Year Integrated Teacher Education Program (B.Sc.-B.Ed.) 2025-26
program: 4-Year Integrated Teacher Education Program (ITEP) B.Sc.-B.Ed. (Secondary Level)

state_of_eligibility.definition: State from where Class XII (or equivalent) was first passed
notes: Improvement attempts from another state do not change state of eligibility
Open Schooling candidates: state of the center is considered

selection_procedure: Scrutiny of applications based on seats and merit
Merit list generation based on NCET-2025 scores
Tie-breaking: older candidate preferred; if tie persists, marks in Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry considered

documents_upload: 10th standard/Matriculation certificate as proof of DOB and Name
Class XII mark sheet/grade card and pass certificate
Proof of state of eligibility (as per rules)
Disability certificate for PwD candidates if applicable

tentative_schedule.event: Start of registration, online application, and application fee payment
Last date of online application submission
Acceptance of allotted seat by online portal payment

general_instructions: Contact Chief Warden for hostel/mess accommodation and fees
Produce all original documents at reporting
Institute fee once deposited is non-refundable
Visit Institute website regularly for updates
